Class UserMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity
          • nespoli.dolci.wat.UserMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable

    public class UserMenu
extends android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity
    This activity is used by a normal user and displays the menu of the user and permits to do the basic operation.
